data.comment: Oostende kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Goal! A Mats Rits header gives Brugge a 0-1 lead in Ostend.
In the minute 38, Makhtar Gueye grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Versluys Arena.
The first-half is over at Versluys Arena.
It's Brugge with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 59, Jelle Bataille (Oostende) has received a yellow card from Kevin Van Damme.
Youssouph Badji is on a sub for Emmanuel Dennis for Brugge.
The home team replace Makhtar Gueye with Cameron McGeehan.
In the minute 68, Theo Ndicka for Oostende has been booked by Kevin Van Damme and receives a first yellow card.
Charles De Ketelaere is replacing Noa Lang for the away team.
Jelle Bataille (Oostende) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 81, Krepin Diatta scores to make it 1-2 at Versluys Arena.
Oostende make their second substitution with Brecht Capon replacing Andrew Hjulsager.
Alexander Blessin (Oostende) is making a third substitution, with Marko Kvasina replacing Theo Ndicka.
The match has come to a close in Ostend. The final score is 1-3.
Goal! Youssouph Badji extends Brugge's lead to 1-3.
